attributes.action: not accept the new European Union Finance Minister plans to limit the City of London Financial services which will drive business both out of the London and the rest of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new French European Union Finance Minster has stated he wants to limit the Finacial activities of the city of the London. He seems to be under the impression it will help the Paris bourse. It will help no country in the EU, it will help Switzerland and India whilst losing the UK tax revenue.
